https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ioHzVT2D2d1UYIcRKF5kzcLp2kk.jpg Ram and Lizzy lead a happy life with their son Gautham. On the boy's sixth birthday, they take him out to the beach where he goes missing. Ram begins a long hunt for his son, which takes him all over the country and drives him to the depths of despair. Will there be redemption in the end? 6 candles
